title: *ONE Month FREE!* Classy East Austin Pad!
posting_body: *After the 1 month free is SELF PRORATED*
Pet friendly with a private pet play area and tons of green areas in the neighborhood, your best friends will get all the exercise they need!
Between the North Loop and University Hills, Windsor Park offers a terrific neighborhood just north of Downtown Austin!
And with I-35 and Highway 290 just a short hop away, getting around the Austin area is easy!
Windsor Park provides a large park, Bartholomew District Park that features a 57-acre park, a swimming pool, a splash pad, disc golf, picnic areas, a playground, and basketball courts!
Resort style amenities like a swimming pool, a picnic/grilling lounge, courtyard, and even a playground all without having to leave your community!
Please don't miss out on this deal, Call/Text Trent to check it out now!

** As a full-time apartment locator I will work day and night to help you find the perfect apartment here in the beautiful Austin Tx, my service is completely FREE to you so please don't hesitate and call me today!
Check out our Apartment Hunters Facebook and Google pages to see over one hundred 5 star reviews written from past clients and their experience with me!
